title: Create, update, and get a document in Google Cloud Firestore
author: Harshil Agrawal
workflow_json: {"id":"179","name":"Create, update, and get a document in Google Cloud Firestore","nodes":[{"name":"On clicking 'execute'","type":"n8n-nodes-base.manualTrigger","position":[250,300],"parameters":{},"typeVersion":1},{"name":"Google Cloud Firestore","type":"n8n-nodes-base.googleFirebaseCloudFirestore","position":[650,300],"parameters":{"columns":"id, name","operation":"create","projectId":"docs-f8925","collection":"n8n"},"credentials":{"googleFirebaseCloudFirestoreOAuth2Api":"Cloud Firestore Credentials"},"typeVersion":1},{"name":"Set","type":"n8n-nodes-base.set","position":[450,300],"parameters":{"values":{"number":[{"name":"id","value":1}],"string":[{"name":"name","value":"n8n"}]},"options":{}},"typeVersion":1},{"name":"Set1","type":"n8n-nodes-base.set","position":[850,300],"parameters":{"values":{"string":[{"name":"name","value":"nodemation"},{"name":"document_id","value":"={{$node[\"Google readme:
This example workflow allows you to create, update, and get a document in Google Cloud Firestore.

The workflow uses the Set node to set the data, however, you might receive data from a different source. Add the node that receives the data before the Set node and set the values you want to insert in a document, in the Set node. Also, update the _**Columns/ attributes**_ fields in the Google Cloud Firestore node.
readme_zh:
此示例工作流允许您在Google Cloud Firestore中创建、更新和获取文档。

该工作流使用Set节点设置数据，但您可能从其他来源接收数据。请在Set节点之前添加接收数据的节点，并在Set节点中设置要插入文档的值。同时，请更新Google Cloud Firestore节点中的_**列/属性**_字段。
title_zh: 在Google Cloud Firestore中创建、更新和获取文档
